item.title: Reading List from Reviews
item.description: Objective: Collect recommendations on books that I don’t know about. Computer Science Code: The Hidden Language of Computer Hardware and Software; Charles Petzold Not much concrete things said in , but a couple of users remark that it got them into CS. Clear presentation of concepts that programmers “tend to know” in a hand-wavy sort of way. Don’t Make Me Think; Steve Krug Faculty member uses it as a required text in most of their UX classes.
